class.name: Noise
class.brief_description: Abstract base class for noise generators.
class.description: This class defines the interface for noise generation libraries to inherit from. A default [method get_seamless_image] implementation is provided for libraries that do not provide seamless noise. This function requests a larger image from the [method get_image] method, reverses the quadrants of the image, then uses the strips of extra width to blend over the seams. Inheriting noise classes can optionally override this function to provide a more optimal algorithm.

method.name: get_image
method.description: Returns an [Image] containing 2D noise values. [b]Note:[/b] With [param normalize] set to [code]false[/code], the default implementation expects the noise generator to return values in the range [code]-1.0[/code] to [code]1.0[/code].

method.name: get_image_3d
method.description: Returns an [Array] of [Image]s containing 3D noise values for use with [method ImageTexture3D.create]. [b]Note:[/b] With [param normalize] set to [code]false[/code], the default implementation expects the noise generator to return values in the range [code]-1.0[/code] to [code]1.0[/code].

method.name: get_noise_1d
method.description: Returns the 1D noise value at the given (x) coordinate.

method.name: get_noise_2d
method.description: Returns the 2D noise value at the given position.

method.name: get_noise_2dv
method.description: Returns the 2D noise value at the given position.

method.name: get_noise_3d
method.description: Returns the 3D noise value at the given position.

method.name: get_noise_3dv
method.description: Returns the 3D noise value at the given position.

method.name: get_seamless_image
method.description: Returns an [Image] containing seamless 2D noise values. [b]Note:[/b] With [param normalize] set to [code]false[/code], the default implementation expects the noise generator to return values in the range [code]-1.0[/code] to [code]1.0[/code].

method.name: get_seamless_image_3d
method.description: Returns an [Array] of [Image]s containing seamless 3D noise values for use with [method ImageTexture3D.create]. [b]Note:[/b] With [param normalize] set to [code]false[/code], the default implementation expects the noise generator to return values in the range [code]-1.0[/code] to [code]1.0[/code].
